item.title: Best Science Books for Curious Minds
item.description: If you’re someone who loves exploring the mysteries of the universe and understanding how things work, then you’ll definitely enjoy these five science books that are perfect for curious minds like yours! A Brief History of Time by Stephen Hawking, a classic that explores the origins and evolution of the universe, from the Big Bang to black holes. Written in a way that’s accessible to non-scientists, this book is a must-read for anyone who wants to understand the fundamental laws that govern the cosmos.
